title: Pike Creek Hills
text: The Pike Creek Hills, are a small range of <a href="hill">hill</a>s west of the community of <a href="Flatwillow%2C%20Montana">Flatwillow</a> in <a href="Petroleum%20County%2C%20Montana">Petroleum</a> and <a href="Fergus%20County%2C%20Montana">Fergus</a> counties in <a href="Montana">Montana</a>. The highest elevation is an unnamed peak at with the stream valleys of Pike Creek to the north and Flatwillow Creek to the south at around . The east end of the <a href="Little%20Snowy%20Mountains">Little Snowy Mountains</a> lie to the west.
